short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn a new language by doing what you already normally do. Replaces words with the foreign language randomly on your page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces words on pages you visit with the language of your choice. 

Add your own dictionary of words or import them from a memrise.com page.

Choose which sites you would like the extension to operate on.
